0.1.5 - 2021.03.25
	* packaging improvements

0.1.4 - 2020.10.20
	* black formatting
	* upgraded black; 20.8b1
	* integrated with pre-commit
	* github acitons
	* tox
	* basic tests
	* packaging

0.1.3 - 2019.05.16
	bumped requirement for pyramid_debugtoolbar to minimum `add_debugtoolbar_panel` version
0.1.2 - 2019.05.01
	- includeme registers the panel via the api method `config.add_debugtoolbar_panel()`
0.1.1 - 2019.04.29
	- versionbump to add python3 classifier
0.1.0 - 2017.05.05
	- added submit button
	- replaced `iteritems` with `items`
	- migrated from panels to extra_panels (https://github.com/jvanasco/pyramid_debugtoolbar_ajax/issues/1)
0.0.4 - 2014.12.17
	added README.md to MANIFEST.in
0.0.3 - 2014.10.25
	added full scheme + http_host to the generated url
0.0.2 - 2014.10.21
	bumped up to get actual item on pypi
0.0.1 - 2014.10.21
	initial import
